description: Object used to track the status of an Asynchronous table job.

jobState.description: The job's state can be one of the following enumerations
jobState.name: AsynchJobState

etag.description: The etag of the status will change whenever the status changes.

jobId.description: The ID if the job issued when this job request was issued.

startedByUserId.description: The ID of the user that started the job

startedOn.description: The date-time when the status of this table last changed to PROCESSING.

changedOn.description: The date-time when the status of this table last changed.

progressMessage.description: The current message of the progress tracker.

progressCurrent.description: The progress current value indicates how much progress has been made. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

progressTotal.description: The progress total indicates the total amount of work to complete. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

errorMessage.description: When processing fails, this is a one line error message.

errorDetails.description: When processing fails, this is the full stack trace of the error.

uploadFileHandleId.description: The ID of the filehandle for a type of UPLOAD

downloadURL.description: The resulting URL for a type of DOWNLOAD
